attributes.action: All asthmatics and people  with lung conditions  should be on shielded list
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel I should be on it as my asthma  isn't good or my lungs . Many out there are like this and want to be shielded  as this disease  attacks the lungs and respiratory system. We are all vulnerable with asthma.
attributes.background: Make all asthmatics and anyone with lung conditions allowed to go on shielding list

rejection.details:
The list of those considered to be extremely vulnerable is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can find some helpful information about asthma and shielding here: https://www.asthma.org.uk/advice/triggers/coronavirus-covid-19/shielding-advice-high-risk/

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
